species.name: delcatty
descriptions: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.
It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
Rather than keeping a permanent lair, it habitually seeks comfortable spots and sleeps there. It is nocturnal and becomes active at dusk.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: normalize
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon's moves all act normal-type.

abilities.name: wonder-skin
abilities.effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.
